message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000. It's a fantastic deal, considering the value it brings. I'm confident this is a price that works for both of us.
I'm really interested in the product, but $1750000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1400000 is a bit too low for me. Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to $1600000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.

I'm still very interested in the product, but $1600000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1450000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be able to make a profit on this deal.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my target price.  I'm willing to drop to $1550000.  This is a significant reduction from my previous offer and still allows you to make a profit.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1475000, which is a bit closer to your target price. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here. I'm willing to drop to $1525000. This is a significant reduction, and I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1475000, which is the same price I offered in round 6. I think this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
